selectTool.title: Selector
selectTool.description: Select the relevant button to use a function.

freeDraw.title: Freehand Drawing
freeDraw.description: Tap and drag to draw lines and shapes.

drawBreakingLine.title: Straight Line
drawBreakingLine.description: Tap to start and add a point, double tap to end.

drawCurveLine.title: Curved Line
drawCurveLine.description: Tap to start and add a point, double tap to end.

drawSquare.title: Quadrilateral Drawing
drawSquare.description: Tap to start and drag to draw a Quadrilateral.

draw–°ircle.title: Circle Drawing
draw–°ircle.description: Tap to start and drag to draw a Circle.

drawTriangle.title: Triangle Drawing
drawTriangle.description: Tap to start and drag to draw a Triangle.

drawMath.title: Math Equation
drawMath.description: Use the Math Editor to add an expression or equation to the canvas.

drawMeasureTool.title: Measure
drawMeasureTool.description: Drag and drop a tool to change location.

EditingTools.title: Editing
EditingTools.description: Select item to apply action, tap again for properties.

questionlist.heading: Questions
questionlist.question: Item
questionlist.blockNavigationToAnsweredQuestions: This assignment is restricted from navigating back to the previous question.

reviewQuestionsModal.reviewTextEnd: Click on a question number to go back to it.
